title: Three Cheers for Boner!
description: Boner, a young body guard in the magical world of Worldster, follows the eccentric and conniving Brahman, a devoted deacon of the god Keester, on a quest to retrieve an ancient treasure. But the treasure they seek may not be the one they find. Join Boner, the Brahman, and an unforgettable cast of characters on this adventure, in "Three Cheers for Boner!," the first title in a new fantasy series.
author: Chris
